title: [Bug]: Cannot authenticate in app (trello)
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

When I add the Trello app in some chat, it shows a log in button. When I click that button, it opens the authentication window in the system's default browser. The link must be openned inside teams-for-linux, otherwise the auth cookies will be set in the default browser, not in teams-for-linux.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Go to a chat
2. Click on + to add an app
3. Chose Trello
4. Try to login
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
